creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three full lines of cursive with a very short line inserted between the first and second lines from the R; written on tall, rectangular tan paper within a thin black border; relief stamp at URC, and another at LLC
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; LLC, rectangular relief stamp; on back, top center, in pencil: [Okubo Shibutsu]
title: Poem
